trans-unit.source: Specifies where messages written by using the SharePoint log service appear in the **Output** window and **Error List** window.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 SharePoint 日志服务编写的消息出现在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的什么位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory> values specify whether a message appears in the **Output** window or **Error List** window (or both), and the group in which the message appears in the **Error List** window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory>值指定在是否显示消息**输出**窗口或**错误列表**窗口 （或两者），和组中显示的消息**错误列表**窗口。

trans-unit.source: To write a message to the **Output** window or **Error List** window from a SharePoint command, use one of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger.WriteLine%2A> methods of an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger> object.
trans-unit.target: 要写入到消息**输出**窗口或**错误列表**窗口从 SharePoint 命令，使用之一<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger.WriteLine%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger>对象。

trans-unit.source: To display verbose messages in the **Output** window, the EnableDiagnostics value under the registry key HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\VisualStudio\10.0\SharePointTools must be set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 要显示详细消息中的**输出**窗口中，HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\VisualStudio\10.0\SharePointTools 必须设置为 1 的注册表项下的 EnableDiagnostics 值。
有关详细信息，请参阅[调试 SharePoint 解决方案](/visualstudio/sharepoint/debugging-sharepoint-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the message appears in the **Output** window and in the **Errors** group of the **Error List** window.
trans-unit.target: 指定消息显示在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的“错误”组中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the message appears in the **Output** window and in the **Message** group of the **Error List** window.
trans-unit.target: 指定消息显示在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的“消息”组中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the message appears only in the **Output** window.
trans-unit.target: 指定消息只出现在“输出”窗口。

trans-unit.source: The message does not appear in the **Error List** window.
trans-unit.target: 消息不会出现在“错误列表”窗口。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the message appears only in the **Output** window, if verbose messages are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指定如果启用了详细消息则消息只出现在“输出”窗口。

trans-unit.source: The message does not appear in the **Error List** window.
trans-unit.target: 消息不会出现在“错误列表”窗口。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the message appears in the **Output** window and in the **Warning** group of the **Error List** window.
trans-unit.target: 指定消息显示在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的“警告”组中。
